WorkItem.Description: I have chosen the [Polished Dragonslayer's Signet] in my finger1 comparison window and equipted it in my finger 1 slot, when i go to my finger 2 comparison window, the same ring is allso selected, and when i unselect it it allso disappers in my finger1 window, so the program think i have 2 of the same ring when i only have one.. The same thing is happening on my shaman.
WorkItem.Summary: Confusion about same finger item in both finger comparison windows

Comments.Message: Hmm, we're not able to repro this... Can you provide exact step by step, click by click, repro steps?

Well, in the charater file i have attached, i have the [Polished Dragonslayer's Signet] equiped in my finger 1 and 2 slot, and i only have 1 of that ring, so when i go in my Finger2 tab in the comparison window and uncheck the [Polished Dragonslayer's Signet] then it usually keeps the ring in finger1, and now when i go to Finger1 tab in comparison window then the [Polished Dragonslayer's Signet] is allso unchecked there. So if i check in finger1 tab that i have that ring available for that finger and equipts it, then i allso think its available for finger2..

The rings are not marked as unique - yet they are a quest reward so they are definitely unique as you can only do the quest once. Probable solution - edit the item (use Tools | Edit Item and select the ring from the list) then tick the box Unique and save.

This should hopefully fix the issue.
yeah, that helped, i'll just do that again if the problem comes up..
